open.title: Frogfoot Outage | Gauteng & Bloemfontein
open.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity on Frogfoot in Gauteng and Bloemfontein. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Affected clients connections have been restored and we are monitoring for any changes
Frogfoot and Afrihost are working to find a permanent solution to restore service to affected clients

open.title: Metrofibre Outage | Talavera Estate & Fernbrook Estate
open.description: Please note users on the Metrofibre network in Talavera Estate & Fernbrook Estate will experience limited to no connectivity due to an outage. Metrofibre engineers are attending to the fault. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
